content: *another crochet classic and an amazingly useful square which i like to make so that the starting chain is almost invisible and new colours are very easy to join seamlessly * **pattern notes** this is a photo tutorial style pattern to show how to make a classic solid granny square **skill level** *easy/beginner* basic stitches and a clear step by step guide **yarn** **needles/hook** recommended hook for yarn **materials** yarn needle **size** dependant on yarn used **gauge** n/a **pattern includes ** * a photo tutorial style pattern * a written pattern at the end of the tutorial **pattern written in ** uk terms us translations given **cherry heart s cozy corner** please come and join the cherry heart group 1 watch podcasts join crochet/knit alongs share your projects and enjoy yarny chit chat **love to share ** #cherryheart 1 http //www ravelry com/groups/cherry-hearts-cozy-corner
